welcome_message_body: Welcome to El Paso, where the warm desert sun meets the charm of a vibrant, multicultural city. Discover our rich history, unique blend of cultures, and delicious cuisine as you explore all that El Paso has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Restaurante Y Recreadero El Tambo
restaurants.description: Restaurante Y Recreadero El Tambo is a south american restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: La terraza del sabor
restaurants.description: La terraza del sabor is a fast food restaurant located in La Loma.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Paso International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the main concourse for domestic flights at El Paso International Airport.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves as the international terminal at El Paso International Airport.

wifi.note: Guests can access the free WiFi network by selecting 'ELP Free WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggs AAF Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Biggs AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
